ComicInfo.Summary:
The newest issue of MAD is out? That’s insane! Featuring “President Obama’s Last 100 Days” and our toy-riffic mash-ups of Donald Trump/Shopkins and Hillary Clinton/My Little Pony! Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Planet Tad, Sergio Aragonés’ MAD Look at New York City, Al Jaffee’s Fold-In and much more! What are you waiting for? Seek asylum with the newest issue of MAD! You’d be crazy not to!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:29:50. [Issue ID 555496]
